name: Happy Differences
description:
There is no time limit for this game.
Enjoy it at your own pace!

More than 100 pictures are waiting for you: the universe, the beautiful sea, fairy houses, and more!
We hope you enjoy the game!

Why we recommend it:
-You can train your memory by finding mistakes!
-Don't worry if you can't find it!
Just press the "hint" button to light up a suspicious place in the picture!
